description: This file is the entry point for a React-based web application, responsible for rendering the root component into the DOM. It imports necessary libraries, global styles, and the main App component, then initializes the React root and renders the application within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Starts rendering the React component tree into the specified DOM node.
